text:
You awaken in a dark alley, laying on your back, your senses thrown into disarray; as your head stops spinning and your heart-rate calms you notice a foul stench creeping up your nose followed by a sudden sharp pain piercing your back. You feel around and notice you've fallen into a pile of rubbish.
...
You could have sworn you were just eating a burger...
...just what exactly is this place?
